document.full_text: the first sports work stoppage of the social networking era has left n.f.l. players concerned, confused and a little distracted. but they were chatty and  -  at least temporarily  -  united.
document.title: players have plenty to say, in short bursts
lines_and_colors: the first sports work stoppage of the social networking era has left n.f.l. players concerned, confused and a little distracted. but they were chatty and  -  at least temporarily  -  united.
